title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.11 - Removal of youth from a local detention center
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.11 - Removal of youth from a local detention center

State Regulations
(a) A youth who is taken to a local detention
center to await transfer to the facility from which he/she absconded must be
removed from the local detention center within three days. This includes a
youth against whom a new petition is filed but who has not been remanded to
detention by court order. (b) The
youth service team coordinator and the director of the facility from which the
youth absconded must act in concert to see that the youth leaves the detention
center and returns to his Division for Youth facility within three days. The
home district supervisor may be contacted for assistance. (c) For travel procedures, see section
181.9
of this Part. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
